name: Aardvarum
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Aardvarum you can Search
your deck for an {insectoid} card and add it to your hand.
You can target and destroy an {insectoid} Elestral.
If you do, you may Special Ascend this
Aardvarum to Antitan from your hand or deck.
effect: When you Cast this Aardvarum you can Search your deck for an {insectoid} card and add it to your hand. You can target and destroy an {insectoid} Elestral. If you do, you may Special Ascend this Aardvarum to Antitan from your hand or deck.
